short_description: a groess underground is a plumbing services company based in kamloops, british columbia, canada.
long_description: an eco friendly small business that strives for 5 star service every time and we are committed to leaving a positive impact on our clients and the environment. giving back to local charities and organizing an annual community cleanup are just some of the ways a groess underground shows we care about our future. we were a finalist for the 2019 business excellence awards in the environmental stewardship category. we love to be able to help out when our clients are in need of our services. it is a dirty job and someone has to do it, let it be groess
